content:
ResourceType Class

Definition

Represents a data service primitive, complex, or entity type.

In this Article

[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerDisplay("{Name}: {InstanceType}, {ResourceTypeKind}")]
public class ResourceType
Inheritance
System.Object
ResourceType

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Nested types are not supported as resource types.

Constructors

ResourceType(Type,ResourceTypeKind,ResourceType,String,String,Boolean)

Creates an instance of a data service ResourceType.

public ResourceType (Type instanceType, System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind resourceTypeKind, System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType baseType, string namespaceName, string name, bool isAbstract);
instanceType
Type

CLR type that represents the format inside the WCF Data Services runtime.

resourceTypeKind
ResourceTypeKind

ResourceTypeKind of the resource type.

baseType
ResourceType

Base type of the resource type as string.

namespaceName
String

Namespace name of the resource type as string.

name
String

Name of the given resource type as string.

isAbstract
Boolean

Boolean value that indicates whether the resource type is an abstract type.

Properties

BaseType

Gets a reference to base resource type, if any.

public System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType BaseType { get; }
Value
ResourceType

ResourceType of the base type.

CanReflectOnInstanceType

Get whether the corresponding instance type represents the CLR type of this entity.

public bool CanReflectOnInstanceType { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the instance type represents a CLR type; otherwise false.

CustomState

Gets or sets a placeholder to hold custom state information about a resource type that is defined by the developer.

public object CustomState { get; set; }
Value
System.Object

Custom state information defined by the developer.

ETagProperties

Gets the list of properties for this type.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty> ETagProperties { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<ResourceProperty>

stem.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1 of ResourceType.

FullName

Gets the full name of the resource.

public string FullName { get; }
Value
String

The full name of the resource type as string.

InstanceType

Reference to the CLR type that this resource represents.

public Type InstanceType { get; }
Value
Type

The instance type as a ResourceType.

IsAbstract

Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether this is an abstract type.

public bool IsAbstract { get; }
Value
Boolean

True if ResourceType is abstract.

IsMediaLinkEntry

Gets or sets a Boolean value that is true if the resource type includes a default stream.

public bool IsMediaLinkEntry { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

A Boolean value that is true if the resource type includes a default stream.

IsOpenType

Gets whether the resource type has open properties.

public bool IsOpenType { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the resource type has open properties defined; otherwise false.

IsReadOnly

Gets a Boolean value that is true if this resource type has been set to read-only.

public bool IsReadOnly { get; }
Value
Boolean

True if this resource type has been set to read-only; otherwise false.

KeyProperties

Gets a list of key properties for this type

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty> KeyProperties { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<ResourceProperty>

stem.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1 of ResourceProperty.

Name

Gets the name of the resource type.

public string Name { get; }
Value
String

Name of the resource type as string.

Namespace

Gets the namespace of the resource type.

public string Namespace { get; }
Value
String

Namespace of the resource type as string.

Properties

Gets a list of properties declared of this type that includes only properties defined on the type, not in the base type.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty> Properties { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<ResourceProperty>

stem.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1 of ResourceProperty.

PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType

List of properties declared on this type.

public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty> PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType { get; }
Value
ReadOnlyCollection<ResourceProperty>

stem.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1 of ResourceProperty.

ResourceTypeKind

Gets the ResourceTypeKind for the type.

public System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceTypeKind ResourceTypeKind { get; }
Value
ResourceTypeKind

ResourceTypeKind.

Methods

AddEntityPropertyMappingAttribute(EntityPropertyMappingAttribute)

Adds an EntityPropertyMappingAttribute for the resource type.

public void AddEntityPropertyMappingAttribute (System.Data.Services.Common.EntityPropertyMappingAttribute attribute);
attribute
EntityPropertyMappingAttribute

The EntityPropertyMappingAttribute to add.

AddProperty(ResourceProperty)

Adds the property supplied by the resourceProperty parameter to the type.

public void AddProperty (System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty property);
property
ResourceProperty

ResourceProperty property to be added.

GetPrimitiveResourceType(Type)

Gets a resource type that represent a primitive type when given a Type object.

public static System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceType GetPrimitiveResourceType (Type type);
type
Type

Type type from which to get the primitive type.

Returns
ResourceType

The resource type.

LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType()

Returns a list of properties declared by this resource type.

protected virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Data.Services.Providers.ResourceProperty> LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType ();
Returns
IEnumerable<ResourceProperty>

The list of properties declared on this type.

Remarks

The LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType method enables you to defer loading of the properties of a resource type. This LoadPropertiesDeclaredOnThisType method is called only one time when either Properties or PropertiesDeclaredOnThisType properties are accessed.

SetReadOnly()

Sets the resource type to read-only.

public void SetReadOnly ();
